name: Attack Of The Aliens!
description:
In Attack Of The Aliens, you play as Agent C, who works for Detective fu and has done for years, but after a huge betrayal Agent C must visit locations overun by aliens!

CONTROLS
WASD/Arrowkeys - Move
Z - shoot
X - enter doors and the ship
